/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. Cars are driving on the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass contrasting with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings and road. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, capturing the energy and movement of the city.
